TopicTitle: What Shapeways Kerbal should I get?

Articles.Content:
Hi Folks

I'm going to order a Kerbal Statue from Shapeways, however can't decide which 1 to get as I can only afford 1 so I figured i'd ask here.

Simply state which Kerbal you think I should order and why.

I'll check back and the kerbal named most by Wednesday June 5th is the winner.
One word: Jebediah. Eventually Bill or Bob if you prefer less wild heroes.
I would pick Bob, since jeb is stuck on Eve, he is my commanding pilot and chief administrator and so far only 1/10 Kerbals died in relation to Jeb's leadership.
Gotta go with Jeb on that one. Mine should be coming in around JUne 5th, so should be interesting to see how it turns out.

Gotta go with Jeb on that one. Mine should be coming in around JUne 5th, so should be interesting to see how it turns out.

I'd love to see a pic before I order, although I hear good things about shapeways, this will be my 1st purchase from them.
I'd love to hear how it turned out.
Come on folks Jeb is winning, there must be some Bill and Bob Kerman fans here too.
